channel.title: D3 on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Mapping the Russian Language
item.description: We met undergraduate Paige Lee while working with her general education class about how borders are constructed. In the class, students were asked to complete a project, choosing from a variety of format options, including making a map. The Harvard Map Collection supported students by advising on searching for data, using mapping software, and scoping out project ideas. In this interview, we look at Paigeâ€™s custom-coded interactive mapping visualization, and learn more about her thought process and workflow.
